channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
i want to mess around with codes and see how things work with using items, npc's, stores so do u guys know any source/client with like edgeville as home or an easy source/client to know things, i was looking for testscape but megauploads is down:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=X9Y464J9
please help

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @shlomi84 shlomi84
item.description:
@shlomi84 wrote:

i used to play insidiaX, i tried the source, that link is invalid and when i tried the source i couldn’t get the game to run, ppl said it was all buggy

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @mitch639 mitch639
item.description:
@mitch639 wrote:

I’d recommend InsidiaX It’s one of my favorite PI sources.

Take a look at it: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/383570-insidiax-v2-final-release.html

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“shlomi84, post:5, topic:439385”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=542079.msg3971693#msg3971693 date=1334211366]
Allstar is good for messing with code, and playing around with the server.

But all the stability is shit,
and code isnt 100% the best way to do things.

Otherwise, just go for hyperion.
[/quote]
thanks , but what is hyperion and pi and delta and all these names im so confused i also heard of domethium? also what is the main difference between 317s, 508s, 600+ and can a pi be 508 or 600+?[/quote]
Hyperion has good coding and is stable.
Delta is easy to edit, and just ‘basic’ i guess you would say. Lots of tuts on them.
PI is a 317 loading newer caches (i.e. 600+). Also quite a few tuts out there.

Read full topic
